predicate: The bwp-id from bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config must match with the BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig from csi-measconfig_nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist

valid: bwp-id: 1 in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config and BWP-Id: 1 in CSI-ResourceConfig
invalid: bwp-id: 1 in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config and BWP-Id: 2 in CSI-ResourceConfig

notes: The evidence explicitly states that the BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in, which implies a match with the bwp-id from bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config.

meta.evidence: - powerControlOffsetSS: which is the assumed ratio of NZP CSI-RS EPRE to SS/PBCH block EPRE. - scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits. - BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in.
